Package com.example.lottary.ui.browse

Class BrowseEventsAdapter

java.lang.Object
androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<BrowseEventsAdapter.VH>
androidx.recyclerview.widget.ListAdapter<Event,BrowseEventsAdapter.VH>
com.example.lottary.ui.browse.BrowseEventsAdapter
class BrowseEventsAdapter extends androidx.recyclerview.widget.ListAdapter<Event,BrowseEventsAdapter.VH>
RecyclerView adapter for the "Browse" list. Responsibilities: - Efficiently render Event items using ListAdapter + DiffUtil. - Bind textual fields (title/location/time/status) and enable/disable the "Join" button depending on whether the event is full. - Forward click events (card click + join click) to the hosting component via BrowseEventsAdapter.Listener. Notes: - This adapter does not perform any data mutation. It renders a snapshot provided via submit(java.util.List). - No stable IDs are used; identity is determined by Event.getId() in the diff callback.

    • DIFF

      private static final androidx.recyclerview.widget.DiffUtil.ItemCallback<Event> DIFF
      DiffUtil for efficient list updates. - Identity: same event id. - Content: fields relevant to current UI (full/title/city/venue/pretty time). If any of these change, the item will be rebound.
